ak47tactic.full: Foreign copy of the Soviet AKM of the sample of 1959, with the workings of foreign specialists. The case is made of steel and impact-resistant plastic. Materials from foreign rifles were used in its creation. It is supplied by traders from Europe.

beretta.full: A family of self-loading pistols, developed in 1972 by Carlo Beretta, Giuseppe Mazetti and Vittorio Valle - the most experienced firearms masters from the Italian company Beretta. A 9 mm Beretta 92F pistol was replaced by a 45-caliber M1911 pistol as a standard US Army pistol with the designation M9.

crossbow1.full: Crossbow designed for military special forces. Delivered by traders from Europe.

crossbow2.full: The crossbow used in game hunting for all kinds of animals. The country of production is unknown.

dp_28.full: A handgun developed by Vasily Alekseevich Degtyarev. The DP was one of the first models of small arms created in the USSR.

mg3.full: German single machine gun. It is an improved version of the MG 42 machine gun. People's craftsmen remade for the mass cartridge.

mg34_lmg.full: A German single machine gun from the time of the Second World War. It was developed by the German company Rheinmetall-Borsig AG at the request of the Wehrmacht. In the USSR, it fell in huge numbers after the war. It was remade by popular craftsmen for the mass cartridge 7.62.

mp40.full: The submachine gun developed by Heinrich Vollmer on the basis of the earlier MP 38 and used as a personal weapon. It was in service with the Wehrmacht during World War II. In the USSR, it was in large quantities in warehouses.

svu.full: The development of a shortened sniper rifle based on the SVD designed for airborne troops began at TsKIB SOO since the 1970s. In parts of the airborne troops, the first samples of the new sniper rifle, designated as SVU or OTs-03 (sample TsKIB third), were demonstrated in 1979. At the time of 1986 it was released in limited edition for special services.

amd65.full: The Hungarian copy of a Kalashnikov for motorized infanty and airborne forces. On a handguard there is the front handle installed for convenience of firing in short and long bursts. The people's craftsmen deprived the automatic machine of a folding butt and removed single fire, having turned it into the killing tool for close quarters combat. It is adapted for 5.45.

amd65n.full: The Hungarian copy of a Kalashnikov for motorized infantry and airborne forces. On a handguard there is the front handle installed for convenience of firing in short and long bursts.

dp_28rust.full: Rusty machine gun. Perhaps, just a waste of cartridges, but this will kill an elephant, in skillful hands.

fg42.full: Rifle of the airborne troops of a 1942 sample. After World War II thousands of salvaged FG-42 were brought to the USSR, and after the Third were plundered by stalkers from RAV warehouses. Handymen remade a rifle for an intermediate Soviet cartridge, and because of a lack of cartridges and complexity of their production, transferred it to feed from integrated cartridge for which fast filling holders from SKS are used.

g43.full: The German autoloading rifle, used in World War II. G-43 is modification of earlier Gewehr 41 rifle with the changed exhaust system similar to that at the Soviet SVT-40 rifle. It is adapted for a mass cartridge.

g43s.full: The German autoloading rifle with a sight, used in  World War II. G-43 is modification of earlier Gewehr 41 rifle with the changed exhaust system similar to that at the Soviet SVT-40 rifle. It is adapted for a mass cartridge.

luger08.full: The legendary German gun, used in World War II. Lugger appeared in huge quantities in RAV warehouses as a trophy. After Third war, was remade for the Pmovsky cartridge 9х18 for unification and cartridges.

luger08rust.full: Rusty German gun of World War II.

m76.full: The sniper rifle developed in Yugoslavia on the basis of a Kalashnikov is adapted for 7.62 × 54 mm

mg34_lmgrust.full: Rusty machine gun. Perhaps waste of cartridges, but can kill an elephant, in skillful hands.

mg3rust.full: Rusty machine gun. Perhaps waste of cartridges, but can kill an elephant, in skillful hands.

mp40rust.full: Rusty echo of World War II.

oc2.full: The submachine gun developed in 1972 by request of the Ministry of Defence of the USSR (ROC «Bush») by designers of TsKIB SOO of Tula N.M. Afanasyev, D.P. Pleshkov and N.V. Trukhachev. The layout scheme of the Czechoslovak Scorpion Vz submachine gun was taken as a basis. 61 samples of 1961.

pmmd63.full: Romanian copy of the Soviet AKMA. In a pursuit of comfort Romanians changed a standard handguard, having integrated into it the handle and by that having increased convenience of firing. Among military the handle got a playful nickname of donkey-Dong.

pmmd65.full: Romanian copy of the Soviet AKMA. 1965 variant, The only difference from md 63 is the metal butt and form of the front handle which is curved backwards, not forward.

stg44.full: An echo of World War II in the aftermath of the Third war. The German automatic machine gun remade by handymen for the Soviet intermediate cartridge. Fans of conspiracy theories call him the primogenitor of joint stock company, however, linear configuration with a returnable spring in a butt and the scheme of dismantling completely corresponds to the American M16.

stg44rust.full: Rusty echo of World War II.

petrol.full: This classical fuel appeared in the Wastes thanks to Central Asian Petrol barons. It is considered rare.
petrol.fail: You managed to pierce a plastic bottle with gasoline and its invaluable contents poured out on the earth, having soiled your boots...

koja.full: Well-cut pieces of leather. Can be sold or used in craft.

shkurs.full: The skin of a dead animal. Can be sold or crafted.

encounter.wolfsnights: You fell into the trap of a wolf pack. A huge pack of wolves is now approaching you.
encounter.spidernights: You have fallen into a spider's lair. Spiders are coming swiftly towards you.
encounter.bearhigh: A loud bear roar is heard nearby. You have noticed that bears are rapidly approaching you,
encounter.wolflider: A wolf pack surrounds you, among them you notice a strange Leader.
encounter.deidont: Something or someone is approaching you, making very loud sounds as it moves.
encounter.devourer: You heard the terrible sounds of an unknown animal, and noticed that something was approaching you from the thicket, towards the meeting.
encounter.defence_1: In the distance, the sounds of gunfire and fighting are heard. Having listened, you can hear the clear cries of people who are asking for help
encounter.fight_6: You hear the whining sounds of some animals and the terrible roar of a monster
encounter.fight_5: The sounds of the struggle of wild animals are heard. Having listened, you hear a loud howl and a squeak of mice.
encounter.fight_4: Surprisingly, you have witnessed wolves hunting their prey.
encounter.fight_3: Surprisingly, you have witnessed wolves hunting their prey.
encounter.fight_2: Surprisingly, you have witnessed wolves hunting their prey.
encounter.fight_1: You heard the sounds of a fight, especially the loud howling of wolves and the bear's roar.
encounter.ratsnights: You have fallen into a rat trap. A huge number of rats are rapidly approaching you.
encounter.roi: You have noticed the rapid approach of small shadows from the thicket to you.
encounter.Ants_2: You have fallen into the Mimrik anthill. A large number of Mimriks are approaching you.
encounter.fail_skip_ph: You did not manage to avoid battle!
encounter.ph_caravan_1: You have noticed the car with well armed group.
encounter.mole: You hear as earth beneath you begins to shiver. Agressive bugs get on the surface from all directions.
encounter.defence2: The cannonade is heard in the distance. Having approached slightly closer, you have noticed that hunters fight for their lives with local fauna.
encounter.lacodon: You notice strange hillocks in the earth. Suddenly hillocks come to life, similar to huge iguanas with full mouths of poisonous teeth.
encounter.trap_1: After you leave the city you have noticed that someone watches you. These are local bandits and they quickly get closer to you.
encounter.ph_caravan_2: You have noticed an old car with a group of armed men.
encounter.defence_2night: The cannonade is in the distance heard. Having approached slightly closer, you have noticed that hunters fight for their lives with awful monsters.
encounter.Mutashiftnights: You hear firing, shouts and howling. Probably someone has stumbled upon a pack of wolves
encounter.lizardnights: At night it becomes too hot in the Dead City. Monsters come out of darkness and close in on to you.
encounter.bigratsnights: The pack of huge rats attacks you.
encounter.lizardshiftnights: You hear firing and shouts. Probably someone has run into terrible monsters.
encounter.Mutanights: The pack of hungry wolves attacks your group.
encounter.bigratshiftnights: You see as the pack of huge rats attacks shift workers.

ph_craft_book2_dog.full: Detailed pattern of backpack with armor for the pet

armor1.full: Civic armor foreign production. Delivered by merchants from Europe.

armor1black.full: The dark version of civilian body armor.

armor1green.full: Hunting version of a civilian body armor.

ctw_armor2.full: Police bulletproof vest. In a good condition.

ctw_head_1rust.full: Old Soviet helmet of the pilot.

ctw_light_1.full: Tactical vest with elements of armor. Good capacity and ease of use make it popular.

ctw_light_2.full: High-tech military vest. Production is somewhere in the Middle East.

ctw_light_2amer.full: The trophy American flag is used in this vest.

ctw_light_2digital.full: The vest uses digital camouflage created in 1984. High efficiency and low profile make it popular among stalkers.

ctw_light_2snake.full: The vest uses gray digital camouflage created in 1984. High efficiency and low profile make it popular among stalkers.

ctw_light_3.full: Vest of foreign sample of excellent quality. There is basic protection.

ctw_light_4.full: High-quality lightweight vest. Very comfortable and ergonomic.

ctw_light_5.full: The origin of this armor is unknown. For the first time delivered a merchant from the Middle East. The quality of materials and armor performance is fascinating.

ctw_light_6.full: Very roomy, complete with basic body armor.

ctw_light_7.full: It is in great demand among hunters and fishermen. Good capacity and comfortable pockets, what else is needed for a successful campaign.

gasmass.full: Protective mask with special points in good condition, delivered by traders from the Middle East.

tacticshield.full: Old shockproof shield in good condition, designed for use by special forces of various law enforcement agencies.

backpack2.full: Popular model at stalkers of a heathland. Say that it brings to the owners good luck.

backpack5.full: An excellent backpack for distant travel.

dog_backpack.full: Armor with a backpack for your pet. It is made manually the skilled handyman.

gasmass1.full: The American gas mask of M17 which is released in 1958. Passed the jungle of Vietnam and still, apparently, smells of napalm. The rare guest in Heathlands as it is delivered in small amounts by dealers from Europe, or remained as a trophy here.

gasmass2.full: The latest Soviet gas mask which came to army on the eve of war. In comparison with civil analogs has higher degree of protection and the increased viewing angle that allows to conduct aim firing and to work with optics.

gasmass3.full: Soviet civil gas mask, the best friend of all pioneers and workers. It was made since 1961 in such huge volumes, as now, many years later after war, he can still be met everywhere.

headpanama.full: It was supposed that it can be used for combined socks with a steel helmet. In a popular speech the new headdress began to be called a hat. However, and in the order it was talked of a hat, however it is more preferable to speak about a subtropical helmet because this product it was developed on a sample of the cotton subtropical helmet entered in troops of People's Commissariat for Internal Affairs on December 27, 1935.

m42.full: A steel helmet of a sample of 1942 (German Stahlhelm Modell 42) — the infantry helmet approved as a standard general helmet of armed forces of the Third Reich in the summer of 1942.

quests.ph_trade1_quest: [Phenomenon] Alexander, the trader, asked you to bring him fuel for his organization. 50 liters should be enough.
quests.ph_trade2_quest: [Phenomenon] Bogdan, the trader, asked you for crafting resources, 50 leather and 30 furs. He has many buyers for such things.
